category.name: Cross Probing.Search Mechanism
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CrossProbing_RelationDepthTraversal
preference.preference_description: Specifies the number of target structures to which the current cross-domain tracing operation extends. The user can enter this number in the text box of the Relation Traversal Depth option in the Options dialog box. Valid Values: 1 - The trace extends one level in the specified direction, highlighting the immediate predecessors or successors. 3 - The trace extends three levels in the specified direction, highlighting the immediate predecessors or successors and two of their upstream or downstream relations.
